name: Kanaya Rainbow Drinker Dashboard- Homestuck

user.name: nocturnalKalopsia
user.about: What is there to say about me that can be summed up in such a short space? I'll give you the short version. I'm just a college student with a Tumblr who likes customizing things occasionally. I like Homestuck, Hetalia, and a bunch of stuff. Look, I got a Tumblr. That will probably explain more about me than this will. Feel free to check it out!
